name: together-tv
description: Watch and listen to media simultaneously on different devices.

scripts.heroku-postbuild: npm run build-server && npm run build-client
scripts.build-client: cd client && npm install && npm run build
scripts.dev: concurrently -n '🤖 Express','⚛️  React  ' -c 'black.bgBlue','black.bgYellow' 'cd server && npm run dev' 'cd client && npm start'
